links.*: Last Riding of the Keepers of the Rings

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|3018|3019|3020|3021|Fourth Age 1|Fourth Age 2|Fourth Age 4}}

==March==
* '''13''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] is again ill from his old wound inflicted by [[Shelob]] two years earlier.<ref name="Chief">{{App|Chief}}</ref>
* '''24''' - The last day of the [[Third Age]], according to the [[New Reckoning]] of [[Gondor]].<ref name="Calendars">{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
* '''25''' - [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]]'s daughter [[Elanor Gardner|Elanor]] is born. The beginning of the [[Fourth Age]], according to the calendars of Gondor.<ref name="Calendars"/>

==September==
* '''21''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] set out from [[Hobbiton]] for the [[Grey Havens]].<ref name="Chief"/>
* '''22''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and [[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] meet the [[Last Riding of the Keepers of the Rings]] in [[Woody End]].<ref name="Chief"/>
* '''29''' - Departure of the [[Ring-bearers]] for [[Valinor]]. This event is also said to mark the end of the Third Age.<ref name="Chief"/>

==October==
* '''6''' - Sam returns to [[Bag End]] on his faithful pony, [[Bill the Pony|Bill]].<ref name="Chief"/>

==Within this Year==
* [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Éomer]] weds [[Lothíriel]] of [[Dol Amroth]].<ref>{{App|Mark}}, ''Third Line''</ref>

{{references}}
